Injured on 4/20/2016 with a Sore Back, out for one week...

Injured on 6/2/2019 with a Inflamed Hamstring Muscle, out for 2-3 weeks...

1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,121,429 through salary arbitration...
